title: Measurement Methodology
description: Methodologies used by measurement agents to evaluate advertising effectiveness

enumDescriptions.mmm: Marketing mix modeling — regression-based channel-level analysis of spend vs outcomes over time
enumDescriptions.mta: Multi-touch attribution — user-level credit assignment across touchpoints
enumDescriptions.incrementality_test: Randomized experiment measuring causal lift from advertising exposure
enumDescriptions.brand_lift_study: Survey-based measurement of awareness, consideration, and purchase intent
enumDescriptions.geo_experiment: Geographic holdout test comparing treatment and control regions
enumDescriptions.unified: Combined methodology integrating multiple measurement approaches
enumDescriptions.custom: Provider-specific methodology not covered by standard types
